title: Homeworld.Deserts.of.Kharak.v1.3-RELOADED
description:
nERv

Homeworld Deserts of Kharak v1.3 (c) Gearbox Publishing

12/2017: RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION: Steam
1: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: Strategy

A ground-based RTS prequel to the classic Homeworld games
Assemble your fleet and lead them to victory on the shifting sands of Kharak
in this compelling strategy game for PC from Blackbird Interactive

A short list of what have been overhauled:

added Tactical Pause
Skirmish and Multiplayer AI
Several Bug fixes
Several Balance changes

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!

NOTE: This is standalone and includes all previous updates and DLCs
